Name: Star Devil
About the game: Star Devil is a Sci-fi Station Survival Roguelike Game with dynamic alien infection. Playable in both single-player and split-screen co-op. In Star Devil you will try to escape an increasingly alien infected space station. To escape you will need to pass through the various different levels of the space station. Fast and Deadly combat You need to master your weapons and stay focused. Because one hit can mean your doom, so keep moving. Procedural generated space station Procedurally generated space station to keep each playthrough fresh. Dynamic alien infestation Escaping the space station is not an easy feat. The space station will get more and more infected by the aliens the longer you spend roaming it. You can counter this by eliminating the aliens and their eggs to slow down the infestation. But you can only slow down the infestation, not stop it. So be swift because otherwise the aliens will corner you fast. Single-player or Split-screen Co-Op Playable in both single-player and split-screen co-op. You need at least one controller to play split-screen co-op.
